title: Long-Term Social Leadership Communication Course Based on CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning environment using smartphones, focusing on social sector content to strengthen managerial leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners can explain social issues in English with 85% accuracy in a CLIL environment.
Learners can revise project presentation materials by applying reflective session feedback at least 70% of the time.
Learners can engage in 15+ minute discussions in the target language (English/French) during team collaboration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
